mean_cn: n. 集合在一起的群众
mean_en: the people who are attending a religious service
word_etyma: con共同 + greg集合 + ation名词后缀 → congregation 集合，集会
short_phrase: a congregation of people in church
sentence: The congregation of tourists are following the tour guide into the scenic area.
sentence_trans: 在导游的带领下，游客们正在进入景区。
